info.title: myndla-api
info.description: NDLA API to manage users and groups related to MyNDLA

get.summary: Fetch top folders that belongs to a user
get.description: Fetch top folders that belongs to a user

parameters.name: include-resources
parameters.description: Choose if resources should be included in the response

parameters.name: include-subfolders
parameters.description: Choose if sub-folders should be included in the response

get.summary: Fetch all resources that belongs to a user
get.description: Fetch all resources that belongs to a user

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Limit the number of results to this many elements

get.summary: Fetch the most recent favorited resource
get.description: Fetch the most recent favorited resource

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: How many latest favorited resources to return

parameters.name: exclude
parameters.description: Which resource types to exclude. If None all resource types are included. To provide multiple resource types, separate by comma (,).

get.summary: Fetch a folder and all its content
get.description: Fetch a folder and all its content

parameters.name: include-resources
parameters.description: Choose if resources should be included in the response

parameters.name: include-subfolders
parameters.description: Choose if sub-folders should be included in the response

get.summary: Fetch resource connections by resource path
get.description: Fetch resource connections by resource path

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: The path of the resource to check

get.summary: Check if a resource has been favorited by the user
get.description: Check if a resource has been favorited by the user

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: The path of the resource to check

post.summary: Creates a resource at root level
post.description: Creates a resource at root level

get.summary: Fetch a shared folder and all its content
get.description: Fetch a shared folder and all its content

patch.summary: Change status for given folder and all its subfolders
patch.description: Change status for given folder and all its subfolders

post.summary: Creates new folder structure based on source folder structure
post.description: Creates new folder structure based on source folder structure

parameters.name: destination-folder-id
parameters.description: Destination UUID of the folder. If None it will be cloned as a root folder.

put.description: Decide order of root resource ids

put.description: Decide order of resource ids in a folder

put.description: Decide order of subfolder ids in a folder

put.description: Decide order of saved shared folders

get.summary: List out all of your own robot definitions
get.description: List out all of your own robot definitions

delete.summary: Delete all data connected to this user
delete.description: Delete all data connected to this user

get.summary: Export all stored user-related data as a json structure
get.description: Export all stored user-related data as a json structure

post.summary: Import all stored user-related data from a exported json structure
post.description: Import all stored user-related data from a exported json structure

parameters.name: config-key
parameters.description: The of configuration value. Can only be one of 'MY_NDLA_WRITE_RESTRICTED'

parameters.name: config-key
parameters.description: The of configuration value. Can only be one of 'MY_NDLA_WRITE_RESTRICTED'

get.summary: Get number of favorites for favorited resources
get.description: Get number of favorites for favorited resources

parameters.name: resourceType
parameters.description: The type of the resource to look up. Comma separated list to support multidisciplinary. Possible values article, audio, concept, image, learningpath, multidisciplinary, topic, video

parameters.name: resourceIds
parameters.description: IDs of the resources to look up

updatedAt.description: Date of when configuration was last updated

updatedBy.description: UserId of who last updated the configuration parameter.

value.description: Value to set configuration param to.

CreateRobotDefinitionDTO.title: CreateRobotDefinitionDTO
CreateRobotDefinitionDTO.description: DTO for creating a new robot definition

code.description: Code stating the type of error

breadcrumbs.description: List of parent folders to resource

rank.description: Where the folder is sorted within its parent

shared.description: When the folder was last shared

sortedIds.description: List of the children ids in sorted order, MUST be all ids

ListOfRobotDefinitionsDTO.title: ListOfRobotDefinitionsDTO
ListOfRobotDefinitionsDTO.description: DTO for listing all robot definitions

arenaEnabled.description: Whether arena is explicitly enabled for the user

resourceId.description: The id of the resource, useful for fetching metadata for the resource

code.description: Code stating the type of error

OwnerDTO.title: OwnerDTO
OwnerDTO.description: Owner of the folder, if the owner have opted in to share their name

resourceId.description: The id of the resource this connection points to

folderId.description: The id of the folder this connection points to

resourceId.description: The id of the resource, useful for fetching metadata for the resource

rank.description: The which rank the resource appears in a sorted sequence

RobotDefinitionDTO.title: RobotDefinitionDTO
RobotDefinitionDTO.description: DTO for creating a new robot definition

id.description: The unique identifier of the robot

configuration.description: The configuration details of the robot

created.description: The date when the robot was created

updated.description: The date when the robot was last updated

shared.description: The date when the robot was shared, if applicable

favourites.description: The number of times the resource has been favorited

numberOfUsers.description: The total number of users registered

numberOfFolders.description: The total number of created folders

numberOfResources.description: The total number of favourited resources

numberOfTags.description: The total number of created tags

numberOfSubjects.description: The total number of favourited subjects

numberOfSharedFolders.description: The total number of shared folders

numberOfMyNdlaLearningPaths.description: The total number of learning paths in My NDLA

arenaEnabled.description: Whether arena should explicitly be enabled for the user

resourceId.description: The id of the resource, useful for fetching metadata for the resource

sharedFolders.description: The shared folder the user has saved

withFavourites.description: The number of users with favourites

noFavourites.description: The number of users with no favourites

withLearningpaths.description: The number of users with learningpaths

arena.description: The number of users in the arena

code.description: Code stating the type of error

ValidationMessage.title: ValidationMessage
ValidationMessage.description: A message describing a validation error on a specific field

field.description: The field the error occured in
